description: Aan Paavam Pollathathu blends humour, emotions and relatable conflicts faced by young married couples. With Rio Raj and Malavika Manoj in lead roles, the film showcases misunderstandings, gender-based debates and communication issues in relationships. It is a warm entertainer now available on OTT.
title: Aan Paavam Pollathathu OTT Release: When and Where to Watch Tamil Romantic Comedy Film Online?

description: Researchers in China have set a new 27.2 percent efficiency record for perovskite solar cells by fixing chlorine-ion clumping, a major barrier to performance. Their simple potassium-based method creates a uniform film and boosts long-term stability, marking a major step toward commercial adoption and more reliable low-cost solar energy.
title: Battery Breakthrough Could Make Solar Panels Cheaper and More Powerful

description: Harish Kalyan’s Diesel arrives on OTT after its theatrical run, bringing a gripping story of survival, corruption, and justice. With powerful performances, detailed direction, and strong action sequences, the film promises a memorable watch for Tamil audiences. Streaming from November 21 on Aha Tamil and Sun NXT, the movie continues to draw attention with its message and IMDb score of 6.4/10.
title: Diesel Set for OTT Release Date: When and Where to Harish Kalyan's Action Thriller Online?

description: Eko (2025) is a gripping science-fiction drama set in a future ruled by an all-controlling system. When a man uncovers a hidden truth, his discovery threatens the established order. Blending mystery, technology and human conflict, the film promises an intense cinematic experience for sci-fi lovers.
title: Eko (2025) OTT Release Date Tipped Online: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Gerry Dee: Funny You Should Say That is a fun and relatable stand-up special filled with everyday humour and storytelling. Discover the streaming details, plot, cast, and how audiences reacted to this feel-good comedy show.
title: Gerry Dee: Funny You Should Say That Now Available on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know

description: A new image of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS captures its glowing tails and a distant barred spiral galaxy, creating a dramatic cosmic overlap. Astronomers say the comet’s unusual features remain natural despite online speculation. With its closest Earth approach in December, researchers are preparing for sharper spacecraft images expected to reveal even more detail.
title: Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Photographed Beside Distant Galaxy in Rare Cosmic Shot

description: Single Papa is an upcoming comedy-drama series that is set to land on Netflix soon. The plot follows a man-child who creates chaos, the ultimate family Kalesh, when he decides to adopt a child post-divorce.
title: Single Papa OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Kunal Khemu’s Upcoming Comedy Drama Series?

description: Now streaming on Times Play and Discovery Plus India, Unheard Cries at GB Road (2025) is a poignant documentary showcasing the lives, struggles, and resilience of individuals from Mumbai’s GB Road. With early acclaim for its raw and empathetic storytelling, the film encourages viewers to witness the human stories often ignored by society. The IMDb rating is not yet available.
title: Unheard Cries at GB Road (2025) Now Streaming on Times Play and Discovery Plus India

description: Dhoolpet Police Station is a comedy-crime series packed with humour, twists and quirky police cases. With strong performances, local charm and a colourful narrative, the show promises light-hearted entertainment. Releasing soon on Aha Tamil, it is already creating buzz for its fun storytelling and vibrant characters.
title: Dhoolpet Police Station OTT Release Revealed: Know Where to Watch it Online?

description: ESA’s Euclid space telescope has captured about 1.2 million galaxies in its first year, providing one of the most detailed wide-field surveys of the universe ever made. Covering distances up to 10 billion light-years, Euclid’s clear, expansive imaging is helping astronomers study galaxy shapes, mergers, dwarf galaxy populations, and the role of supermassive black holes, while preparing to map billions more galaxies over the mission’s full six-year duration.
title: ESA’s Euclid Telescope Charts Over a Million Galaxies in Landmark First Data

description: Astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope have detected a distant, metal-poor galaxy whose unusually massive, ultraviolet-bright stars match the expected signatures of Population III — the universe’s first stars. Through the help of gravitational lensing and Webb’s infrared sensitivity, researchers observed light from just 800 million years after the Big Bang, offering one of the strongest clues yet to how the earliest stars ignited and shaped the first galaxies.
title: James Webb Space Telescope May Have Spotted the Universe’s First Stars, Astronomers Say

description: Thandakaaraanyam is a forest-based thriller filled with suspense, danger and hidden truths. With haunting visuals and emotional performances, the film delivers a tense and engaging narrative. It follows characters trapped in a mysterious forest, uncovering secrets that change their lives. A must-watch for fans of dark thrillers.
title: Thandakaaraanyam Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: A Dark Thriller Set in a Mysterious Forest

description: This roundup highlights the top tablets under Rs. 20,000 in India, including the OnePlus Pad Go, Moto Pad 60 Neo, Lenovo Idea Tab, OnePlus Pad Lite and HMD T21 Tablet. These models offer features such as large high-resolution displays, octa-core processors, up to 8GB RAM, long-lasting batteries, stereo speakers and clean software experiences. Each tablet brings a different balance of performance and usability, giving students, professionals and everyday users strong, affordable options across entertainment, productivity and online learning.
title: Best Tablets Under Rs 20,000 in India: OnePlus Pad Go, Moto Pad 60 Neo, Lenovo Idea Tab and More

description: There will be no new EA Sports F1 game in 2026, Electronic Arts has announced. Instead, EA will release a paid expansion for F1 25 next year that will bring the game up to date with the 2026 Formula One season. A full new F1 game will be launched in 2027.
title: EA Sports Will Skip F1 Game in 2026 and Instead Release Paid Expansion for F1 25

description: Booking an LPG cylinder when you don't have a gas pipeline in your locality can be a tedious task. Questions like which number to call, which app to download, and where to go come to one's mind. To help its customers, HP Gas allows people to book a refill or a new cylinder through various online and offline methods. There is an HP Pay app, available on the Google Play Store and Apple's App Store, which allows customers to book a cylinder, apart from an IVRS number, a WhatsApp chatbot, and a website.
title: HP Gas Booking Numbers: How to Book LPG Cylinder Using Different Methods

description: WhatsApp’s contact-discovery flaw let researchers match 3.5 billion phone numbers to active accounts. By exploiting the absence of rate limits, they checked vast number ranges to see which were registered. They also found that many users exposed their profile photos and About texts publicly. The team even identified millions of accounts in countries where WhatsApp is banned. Meta fixed the issue after disclosure.
title: WhatsApp Security Flaw Exposed Billions of Phone Numbers: Details

description: A new NordPass report shows “123456” remains the most common password globally in 2025, followed by “admin” and other simple number strings. India’s list mirrors global trends, with “Pass@123” also appearing. NordPass says weak and guessable passwords remain widespread across age groups despite rising awareness. The firm recommends stronger, unique passwords and multi-factor authentication.
title: Most Common Passwords in 2025: ‘123456’ and ‘Admin’ Tops the List, Research Says

description: The Noise Master Buds Max aim to compete with segment-leading brands like JBL and Sony. Priced at Rs. 11,999, they are the first over-ear headphones in the brand’s flagship Master Buds series. The headphones come with ‘Sound by Bose’, but is it just a label or do the headphones punch above their weight? Here’s our Noise Master Buds Max review.
title: Noise Master Buds Max Review: Bose Badge, Boss Performance

description: Airtel, Jio, and Vodafone Idea (Vi) are the top telecom service providers (TSPs) in India, and they continue to compete with an ever-expanding range of prepaid recharge options. For users who prefer long-term convenience, all three TSPs also provide select prepaid packs that stay active for a full year, eliminating the need for monthly recharges. So, if you’ve been considering shifting to a one-year plan, our latest guide could help you make an informed choice.
title: Airtel vs Jio Vs Vi: Cheapest Prepaid Plans with One Year Validity

description: Sundar Pichai has acknowledged rising concerns over an AI investment bubble, warning that no company, including Google, would be immune if it bursts. In an interview with the BBC, he compared current market behaviour to the dotcom era and noted elements of irrationality in today’s funding climate. Pichai also cautioned users against blindly trusting AI chatbots and urged verification of critical information.
title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai Speaks on AI Bubble, Says No Company Is Immune: Report

description: Samsung and AU Small Finance Bank are coming together to introduce the Tap & Pay feature for AU Visa Credit Card users through Samsung Wallet. The company said that this allows people to make credit card payments directly from their Galaxy smartphones, without having to carry cards in physical form. This comes as part of the slew of new features that the company has been recently announcing for the Samsung Wallet app in India. Recently, the tech giant brought a feature that enables users to add their UPI accounts during the initial setup of their handsets.
title: Samsung Partners AU Small Finance Bank to Add Tap & Pay Support For AU Visa Credit Cards

description: Swiss crypto bank AMINA Bank AG has received approval from Hong Kong’s Securities and Futures Commission to offer institutional digital asset trading and custody through its AMINA Hong Kong subsidiary. The licence allows the bank to support around 13 cryptocurrencies and marks a notable step in the city’s strategy to expand regulated access for professional investors. The upgrade adds momentum to Hong Kong’s broader push towards a structured digital asset ecosystem.
title: Swiss Crypto Bank AMINA Granted Hong Kong Licence to Serve Institutions

description: Despite a weak single-player campaign and some multiplayer missteps, Battlefield 6 is an undeniably fun and incredibly immersive military shooter that marks a return to form for the series. Its large-scale multiplayer modes, intense gunplay, and unscripted chaos bring back the highs of the franchise last seen in Battlefield 1.
title: Battlefield 6 Review: EA's Military Shooter Returns to Form

description: Cloudflare suffered a major outage after an internal permissions change caused its Bot Management system to generate an oversized feature file that repeatedly broke proxy services. The faulty file was circulated across the network, triggering hours of failures that initially resembled a DDoS attack. Cloudflare halted the bad file, restored a stable version, and rebooted services to bring traffic back to normal.
title: Cloudflare Explains How Configuration Change Took Down 20 Percent of the Internet

description: Google’s Play Best of 2025 award winners were announced on Tuesday (November 18), listing the top-performing games and apps in India. While Zomato’s events and ticketing platform was this year’s received the title of the best app on Google Play Store in 2025, CookieRun India was the best game in the outgoing year. Moreover, Intamart, the quick commerce platform, and Seekho, a short video learning app, were two of the top trending apps in their respective categories.
title: Google Play Best of 2025: District by Zomato, CookieRun Among Top Apps and Games on Play Store in India

description: HMD Terra M is an ultra-rugged smart feature phone designed for frontline workers, government agencies, defence forces, and enterprise teams under the company’s HMD Secure division. Launching in Q1 2026, the device offers MIL-STD-810H durability, IP68/IP69K protection, a 2.8-inch glove-friendly display, Push-to-Talk and emergency keys, and 4G connectivity with dual SIM and eSIM support. It runs on Qualcomm’s Dragonwing QCM2290 chipset with MDM support, pre-loaded enterprise apps, and five years of security updates. Optional accessories include a stackable charging dock and a belt clip holster.
title: HMD Terra M Launched With Up to 10-Day Battery Life, MDM Support and IP69K Rating: Availability, Features

description: Wobble One has been launched in India as the Indkal Technologies-owned company’s first smartphone. The handset will be offered in the country via multiple retail channels, including Amazon. It will be available for customers from December 12. It features a USB Type-C port and a 3.5mm headphone jack on the bottom, for charging and wired audio output devices. It is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset, paired with up to 12GB of RAM and up to 256GB of onboard storage.
title: Wobble One Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy A57 5G has appeared in multiple certifications, revealing key upgrades ahead of launch. A 3C listing shows the phone will support 45W wired charging, potentially making it faster to charge than the Galaxy S26 series, which is listed with only 25W support. The A57 is still expected to remain a mid-range device with an Exynos 1680 chipset, recently spotted on Bluetooth SIG with Bluetooth 6.1. Other leaks indicate an AMD-based Xclipse 550 GPU and no flagship-level features like wireless charging.
title: Samsung Galaxy A57 5G Listed on 3C Website, Could Support Faster Charging Than Samsung Galaxy S26

description: Sony has announced its Black Friday sale in India. The sale will begin on November 21 and will last till December 4. The Black Friday sale brings discounts on PS5 consoles, peripherals, and games. PS5 physical and digital edition consoles are discounted by Rs. 5,000.
title: Sony Announces Black Friday Sale in India, PS5 Gets Rs. 5,000 Discount

description: Apple’s new N1 wireless networking chip, introduced with the iPhone 17 series and iPhone Air, delivers a major real-world performance boost over the previous generation and competes closely with Android flagships. Crowdsourced Ookla data shows higher speeds, stronger consistency in weak Wi-Fi conditions and improved reliability, despite the N1 lacking full 320MHz Wi-Fi 7 support.
title: Apple’s New N1 Wireless Chip Reportedly Rivals Android Flagships in Real-World Wi-Fi Speeds

description: Bitcoin traded near $92,600 as the crypto market attempted to stabilise after yesterday’s dip below $90,000. Traders monitored liquidity conditions, whale activity, and key support levels while awaiting cues from the upcoming US FOMC meeting minutes. Altcoins traded mixed, with some tokens seeing mild relief after heavy selling earlier in the week. Analysts noted that sentiment remains fragile but improving as buying interest returns gradually following the recent correction.
title: Crypto Market Tests Crucial Support as Bitcoin’s Price Rises Above $90,000

description: We tested the latest updates for Grok and ChatGPT. The test was largely focused on emotional intelligence, which results in more natural conversations and creative writing capability. While GPT-5.1 gave a strong fight to Elon Musk’s AI model, the latter was a clear winner due to its higher prompt adherence and adaptability.
title: Grok 4.1 vs ChatGPT-5.1: The Key Differences You Need to Know

description: BSNL has been reducing the validity and benefits of its various relatively affordable prepaid plans. A few months ago, the telecom service provider (TSP) reduced the validity of the Rs. 197 recharge voucher to 54 days. Now, the company has also reduced the validity of the Rs. 107 prepaid plan to 22 days, which used to 28 days of validity. The recharge plan reportedly offered 35 days of validity initially, which was reduced to 28 days. Moreover, the validity of the Rs. 197 plan has also been shortened to 42 days.
title: BSNL Reduces Validity of Rs. 107 Prepaid Recharge Plan Again; Subscribers to Get Same Benefits

description: Poco has confirmed that the upcoming Poco F8 Ultra will feature a 6,500mAh battery, while the Poco F8 Pro will include a 6,210mAh unit ahead of their global launch on November 26. Expected to debut as a rebranded Redmi K90 Pro Max, the F8 Ultra is tipped to offer  LPDDR5X RAM, UFS 4.1 storage, a 6.9-inch AMOLED display, Bose-tuned speakers, and a triple 50-megapixel rear camera setup with 5x optical zoom.
title: Poco F8 Ultra Design, Key Features Leaked; Company Reveals Battery Specifications Ahead of Global Debut

description: Xiaomi official has now warned that its product retail prices could rise even further next year, although the price hike may not be enough to absorb the soaring manufacturing costs. This is amid the shortage of key smartphone components such as memory chips, which as led to price hikes of up to 60 percent. Consequently, several flagship smartphones that offer AI-centric features have been heavily impacted, with their prices witnessing an uptick due to the rising chip costs.
title: Smartphones Could Get Even More Expensive Next Year Amid Rising Component Costs, Xiaomi President Warns

description: Jio is widening its AI offerings by making the Jio Gemini Pro Plan, upgraded with Google’s latest Gemini 3 model, free for all Unlimited 5G subscribers for 18 months. What was once a youth-exclusive benefit is now open to the entire 5G user base. The plan, worth Rs. 35,100, becomes available for activation through the MyJio app starting November 19, 2025. Users only need an active Jio SIM and an Unlimited 5G plan to access the complimentary subscription.
title: Jio Brings Google's Gemini 3 AI Model to All 5G Unlimited Subscribers: Check Eligibility, Benefits

description: A listing for a previously unknown Realme smartphone has been sighted on Amazon. The purported handset could be launched as the Realme 15 Lite 5G and the listing also reveals its key specifications and price in India. It is expected to come with a 6.78-inch 120Hz OLED screen and dual 50-megapixel rear cameras. The Realme 15 Lite 5G could be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8000 chipset and pack a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Realme 15 Lite 5G Listed on Amazon With Dimensity 8000 Chipset: Price in India, Specifications

description: Apple on Tuesday announced new AppleCare+ coverage options in India. It is rolling out new affordable annual and monthly plans that provide customers with more flexibility in how their Apple devices remain protected. The Cupertino-based tech giant has added coverage for up to two incidents of theft or loss each year with the AppleCare+ with Theft and Loss for iPhone plan. Additionally, customers will also be eligible for all of the regular benefits, including priority support, battery replacement service, unlimited repairs for accidental damage, and more.
title: New AppleCare+ Coverage Options in India Announced With Theft and Loss Protection for iPhone

description: Qualcomm on Wednesday announced the launch date of its upcoming flagship chipset, named Snapdragon 8 Gen 5. The latest addition to the Snapdragon 8 platform is expected to sit below the top-of-the-line Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 in the company’s lineup. While its specifications remain under wraps, reports suggest that the SoC could deliver performance almost at par with the aforementioned silicon. The Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 is expected to use the same Adreno GPU as the 8 Elite Gen 5.
title: Qualcomm Announces Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chipset Launch Date in China: What to Expect

description: The Vivo V60e is a decent option in its segment, at least on paper. It promises a premium design, vibrant display, great cameras, and a long battery life. However, on-paper metrics often fail to translate into the real-world experience. So, does the Vivo V60e deliver on its USP and make a sensible purchase in this highly competitive price bracket? Here’s our review.
title: Vivo V60e Review: Style, Substance, and Stamina
